data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.1: Access Control
data.phrase:
datamodel
| filter xdm.event.type contains "Access"
| filter xdm.source.user_agent contains "Mac" OR xdm.source.host.os_family contains "MAC"
| fields _time, xdm.event.type, xdm.source.user_agent, xdm.target.sent_bytes, xdm.observer.product

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.3: Audit and Accountability
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.event.operation contains "REGISTRY" /*Filter for registry events*/
| filter xdm.event.operation contains "*"
| fields _time, xdm.event.type, xdm.event.operation, xdm.event.operation_sub_type, xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.source.process.name, xdm.source.process.executable.path, xdm.event.outcome, xdm.observer.product

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.4: Configuration Management
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*"
| dedup xdm.source.host.hostname 
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.observer.content_version

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.5: Identification and Authentication
data.phrase:
datamodel | filter xdm.alert.original_alert_id ="kerberos_tgs_req" //krb_tgs_data record description
| filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_type = "PRINCIPAL" and xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_values contains "*"
| fields xdm.alert.original_alert_id, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_values, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.error_code, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.kdc_options, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.msg_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.padata_prefix, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.spn_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.spn_values, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.ticket_expiration, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.ticket_prefix

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.6: Incident Response
data.phrase:
datamodel
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*"
| fields xdm.network.rule, xdm.network.application_protocol, xdm.network.application_protocol_category, xdm.network.http.method, xdm.network.http.response_code, xdm.network.http.url_category, xdm.network.ip_protocol, xdm.network.protocol_layers, xdm.network.session_id

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.7: Maintenance
data.phrase:
datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product = "XDR agent"
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*"
| dedup xdm.observer.name
| fields xdm.observer.product , xdm.observer.name, xdm.observer.content_version, xdm.observer.type, xdm.observer.unique_identifier, xdm.observer.vendor, xdm.observer.version, _time

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.9: Personnel Security
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.source.user.employee_id != "*"
| fields xdm.source.user.first_name, xdm.source.user.last_name, xdm.source.user.middle_name, xdm.source.user.employee_id, xdm.source.user.badge_id

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.10: Physical Protection
data.phrase:
datamodel
| filter xdm.source.user.badge_id != "*"
| fields xdm.source.user.first_name, xdm.source.user.last_name, xdm.source.user.middle_name, xdm.source.user.employee_id, xdm.source.user.badge_id

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.11: Risk Assessment
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.source.agent.version contains "*" 
| filter XDM.source.host.os contains "*"
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.host.ipv4_addresses, xdm.source.host.mac_addresses, xdm.source.host.os, xdm.source.host.os_family

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.12: Security Assessment
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" 
| filter xdm.source.agent.version contains "*"
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.agent.version, xdm.source.host.ipv4_addresses, xdm.source.host.mac_addresses, xdm.source.host.os, xdm.source.agent.content_version, xdm.source.agent.identifier

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.13: Systems and Communications Protection
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type contains "AES" 
| filter xdm.target.host.hostname contains ""
| fields xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type , xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.ipv4, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.port, xdm.target.host.hostname, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.user.username

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.14: System and Information Integrity
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.product contains "XDR" 
| filter xdm.observer.type contains "*"
| fields xdm.observer.content_version, xdm.observer.name, xdm.observer.product, xdm.observer.type, xdm.observer.unique_identifier, xdm.observer.vendor, xdm.observer.version
